channel.title: Edit User :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Editing a User The next major feature we can add to our frontend application is the ability to edit a user. To do this, we’ll need to create a view and a component that contains the form fields for editing a user, as well as the logic to communicate any changes back to the API. As always, we’ll start by adding a route to our src/router/index.js file for this route:
